channel.title: Rune Legacy
channel.description:
[img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/3299/headerxhp.png[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][URL=http://www.rlwebclient.com/] Play Now[/URL] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://www.Rune-Legacy.com/] Forums[/URL] [img]http://rune-legacy.com/img/facebook.png[/img][URL=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Rune-Legacy/179233288793167] Facebook[/URL] [img]http://rune-legacy.com/img/twitter.png[/img][URL=https://twitter.com/#!/RuneLegacyNews] Twitter[/URL] [img]http://rune-legacy.com/img/youtube.png[/img][URL=http://www.youtube.com/runelegacynews] YouTube[/URL]
[B]Why Rune Legacy?[/B]
We're glad to say that we have officially been up for 2 full years. In the end of the day, this community isn't planning to shut down, that extra bit of security knowing that you can get home and play a wonderful server should be enough. If it isn't, check out our wonderful features, a server with 100+ players, we try to tend to our players needs and not that of our own.
[B]Main Features:[/B]
- 100+ players & 100% uptime - Daily community events and updates - IPB integrated forums - Pk, Skilling, Quest, Minigame & Boss server - All working Prayers including Retribution & Redemption - Reward Shops, for Pking, Skilling, Voting, Slayer. Even an Honour Shop for great Pkers - Castle Wars with working Barricades, Explosives and Tinderbox - Full Hunting Skill - Optional Bank Pin + Bank Pin recovery feature for account safety. - Unique Quests designed only for Rune-Legacy - Full Music System & Sound to bring back the RS memories - Hiscores - Clue Scrolls offering great rewards - Don't miss out on the action, register your account today.
[B]Rune Legacy Media[/B]
Check out our official YouTube page: [url=http://YouTube.com/RuneLegacyNews]http://YouTube.com/RuneLegacyNews[/url]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eh75sl-U7ng
[B]RuneLegacyNews[/B]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/4cX2dc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m538/xgenesisr/cwars1.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zxqjh4.png[/img]
[img]http://runecient.com/img/RuneLegacyImage2.png[/img]

item.title: Rune Legacy
item.dc:creator: @xGenesis xGenesis
item.description:
@xGenesis wrote:

  • A bug has been patched where the wrong skilled was globally announced at 99.
  • Lootshare has been added in-game.
  • Voting has been added. You can now vote for 1m, for voting tokens, or for a Mystery box.
  • Range/Mage has been added to Jad
  • After 15 kills (without logging out) you will now receive a fire cape. If you guys want I can make it a little bit deeper, by lowering the kills requirement and adding it so if you die you have to start over. (Test it first then let me know)
  • Clicking on thieving has been made faster.
  • Patched a bug with bolts disappearing
  • You will now randomly receive anti-fire potions instead of magic potions (sometimes) when doing herblore. The antifire potions have been made functional.
  • Dragon Axe now has a 25% chance of giving you double logs + exp.
  • Wildy Dog no longer give exp
  • Zammy spear special
  • Free item tab (Every 30 minutes you are given either free items, small amount of money, or Pk/Skill points)
  • Fixed a bug with Duel Arena not working
  • Added snow in-game
  • Fixed a bug with moving items
  • Fixed a bug with arrows
  • Added Server annoucement Timer very 4 hours
  • Lootshare now only announces drops that are over 10k shop value
  • Can now use PkPoints and Skill Points with BlackJack
  • Fixed Duel Arena bug where equipping an item ended the duel
  • Fixed a bug where XP Lamp said the wrong skill
  • Fixed a bug where banking would close right after woodcutting
  • If your total level is 400 or above you now receive a random Santa item
  • Removed kill limit for Vesta
  • Increased Friends Chat to 50 people
  • Removed black demon at Zammy GWD Dungeon
  • Assault 2 shop now requires 2x more points than the regular Barbarian Assault
  • Created a server yell system for voting which will announce once every 2 hours (time can be changed if you wish)
  • Starter cash has been reduced to 250k since people were abusing it to get “free play” at BlackJack.
  • New event timer tab which will show how much longer until the next event (huge thanks to Fiddle Me for creating the sprite)
  • Events will now save after server updates. Meaning if you had 1 hour left until the next event, once the update is finished it will be at 1 hour and not 3.
  • Zuriels has been added to donations
  • You must now wait seconds to leave the Wilderness Cave (even if you click the exit)
  • Wilderness Cave is now level 40 instead of 100+
  • Made an ajustment to Dbow and Mage Bow spec
  • Made an adjustment to Claws vs NPC
  • Adjustments to Melee Formula
  • Added the ability to view Max Hit in the Quest Tab
  • Made changes to GMaul Spec (please let me know if it is noticeable)
  • Rune Armor is now in ::shops
  • Fixed following for mage (after you finished maging, the player looked like it was still following you)
  • Fixed it so it doesn’t follow you all the way when farcasting
  • Fixed following for mage (after you finished maging, the player looked like it was still following you)
  • Fixed it so it doesn’t follow you all the way when farcasting
  • Fixed Infinity items + Master Wand not being tradable and turning into pets.
  • Prayer Exp increased for RSMode
  • New armor in the reward timer, team capes, full ancients, full rune bandos, headdresses
  • vote points have been re-added
  • Added Ancient Ceremonial. Wearing this at Godwars will let you use the portal for free. After using the portal you can bank the armor
  • Moved NPCs around Edgeville
  • Lottery entry fee has decreased from 10m to 1m.

Read full topic
